item.title: About
item.description:
Hello! My name is Emmanuella Rumanti, also known as amuritna [1].

I can be contacted via e-mail. You can also find me on LinkedIn and GitHub.

At the moment, I am affliated with the School of Electrical Engineering and Informatics at Institut Teknologi Bandung, Indonesia, where I am in my last year of pursuing a B.S. in Electrical Engineering.

My current work — my team’s capstone design project — focuses on how we can secure voice communication on an untrusted device. Personally, I am in particular interested in exploring utilizations of the audio channel, end-to-end encryption, computation, and specialized hardware design.

item.title: [Repost] Modular Origami
item.description:
Note: This is a post originally published on December 22, 2019 on my old site. It has been reposted here for archival purposes.

If a modular origami construction is a book of fiction, then it is an anthology of tales, not a novel.
